attributes.action: Force Employers to give us our wages in cash
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: force employers to give us the option to receive our wages in cash, thus side stepping the banking system and allowing us the honest worker to keep our money in our pockets instead of seeing great swathes of it taken up by unfair bank charges levied by feckless bankers that are no social benefit to the country.

rejection.details: There are already a number of similar petitions that you may wish to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/moneyfreedom/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/NoBanks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
